text.font-family: Helvetica, sans-serif, Segoe UI Emoji
Excalifont, Xiaolai, sans-serif, Segoe UI Emoji

g.text: S -> Minutes measured by hour glass

text.font-family: Excalifont, Xiaolai, sans-serif, Segoe UI Emoji
Excalifont, Xiaolai, sans-serif, Segoe UI Emoji

g.text: M -> Minutes for Vadim left for errands

text.font-family: Excalifont, Xiaolai, sans-serif, Segoe UI Emoji

g.text: One bulb of hourglass already fell. Despite, he will

text.font-family: Excalifont, Xiaolai, sans-serif, Segoe UI Emoji

g.text: wait another 10 minutes to flip it. But at 17 mins from

text.font-family: Excalifont, Xiaolai, sans-serif, Segoe UI Emoji

g.text: beginning, Vadim would left for errand. By 20 mins,

text.font-family: Excalifont, Xiaolai, sans-serif, Segoe UI Emoji

g.text: bulb of hourglass will remain empty. So there is no mins

text.font-family: Excalifont, Xiaolai, sans-serif, Segoe UI Emoji

g.text: for more sand to fall before errands.

text.font-family: Excalifont, Xiaolai, sans-serif, Segoe UI Emoji
Excalifont, Xiaolai, sans-serif, Segoe UI Emoji
Excalifont, Xiaolai, sans-serif, Segoe UI Emoji

Excalifont, Xiaolai, sans-serif, Segoe UI Emoji
Excalifont, Xiaolai, sans-serif, Segoe UI Emoji

g.text: Hourglass measured for every 12 mins. Vadim flips after every 2mins.

text.font-family: Excalifont, Xiaolai, sans-serif, Segoe UI Emoji

g.text: This means, after he flips, the sand on the other side of the bulb would flips

text.font-family: Excalifont, Xiaolai, sans-serif, Segoe UI Emoji

g.text: for 2 mins (obviously, same sand would fall for same time). Hourglass would

text.font-family: Excalifont, Xiaolai, sans-serif, Segoe UI Emoji

g.text: fall for 1mins only till Vadim left after 3 mins.
